left_text: Carina of T6 with numerous spines (Fig. 81-9b); T6 with distinct lateral tooth; T7 produced to median spine (Fig. 81-9b)
right_text: Carina of T6 simple, irregularly crenulate or nodulose (Fig. 81-9c); lateral tooth of T6 absent or very blunt; T7 not produced to spine

left_text: T7 broad, subtruncate, much exserted, exposed part thus as long as T6
right_text: T7 bidentate or bilobed with median apical emargination (Fig. 81-9c), or rounded, exposed part much shorter than T6
right_target: H. (Odontanthocopa) Key to the Subgenera of Hoplosmia (Females) 1. Scutellum not overhanging metanotum ........................ .......................................... H. (Odontanthocopa) (in part)

left_text: Body clothed with reddish hair that obscures frons and scutum
right_text: Body clothed with off-white hair that does not obscure frons and scutum

left_text: Preoccipital margin carinate dorsally; scopal hairs slender, crinkly, not blunted apically; hind basitarsus at least four times as long as broad
right_text: Preoccipital margin not carinate dorsally though rather abruptly angled; scopal hairs stout, smooth, blunted apically; hind basitarsus three times as long as broad
